extension.description: VS Code extension for intelligent SCM operations - Multilingual commit message generation with AI support (25 languages supported) and future PR management features.
config.messageStyle: Style and length of generated commit messages
config.messageStyle.normal: Normal length with some context (1200 chars)
config.customMessage: Custom message to append to the system prompt (added after the diff message)
config.useEmoji: Use emoji in commit messages and PR descriptions
config.emojiStyle: Style of emoji to use in messages
config.reasoningEffort: GPT-5.2 reasoning effort level (affects response quality and latency)
config.maxInputTokens: Maximum input tokens for AI processing (default: 200K)
config.useBulletList: Format commit message body as a bullet list
config.useConventionalCommits: Use Conventional Commits format with scope (<type>(<scope>): <subject>)
config.appendCommitTrailer: Append 'Commit-Message-By: otak-committer' trailer to generated commit messages
config.syncApiKeys: Sync API keys via VS Code Settings Sync (stores keys in synced extension state)
